alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued October 11 at 4:42AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Multiple Rounds of Soaking Rain with Localized Threat for Flooding Tonight through the Weekend... A fall storm system will move through the Great Lakes leading to multiple rounds of soaking rain over the next few days. The first round of soaking rain is expected tonight followed by the next round Friday into Saturday. Repeated rounds of rain over the same area with limited time for runoff and infiltration into the soil may lead to localized flooding of low-lying and urban areas, as well as streams and creeks. Rises in river levels may occur into this weekend, as well. Stay up to date on the forecast and heed any Watches, Advisories, or Warnings issued for your area.
